amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of the Interior to include those areas requested by State Governors in any environmental review conducted or statement prepared for the leasing program under the National Environmental Policy Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 113-131 to require the Secretary of the Interior to include those areas requested by State Governors in any environmental review conducted or statement prepared for the leasing program under the National Environmental Policy Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brady (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
